comment: Works as advertised, runs smooth on moto 360, only thing is app needs ability not only to view photos from media gallery but play back recorded videos in gallerey as well. Other than that 2 👍s up.

author: Sapphire Sakthi
comment: Want refund

author: Sigi E
comment: Works perfectly!!
title: Thumbs Up

author: Paul Quinn
comment: Simple but effective. The best parts are you can choose which folders to sync and it syncs up automatically. For example, you can set your CAMERA folder to sync and it will sync the photos you take as you take them (within about 30-60 seconds). The developer should write a better description so more people know exactly what the app can do. (LG Urbane, Lollipop)

author: Derek Wyman
comment: Works as advertised. Great zoom function and none of the "syncing" requirements of other Wear apps.

author: Gray H
comment: Good app no messing with syncing run app and pics are there very good app. Straight forward does what it says and easy.
title: Great

author: David Skurat
comment: As of June 21st update it is now working on my moto 360. The app on watch is best I seen in Android wear gallery apps. 5 stars all the way. All other app sink to watch but can't get thus one to work moto 360. Will rate hire if fixed.

reply.author: Jajaz.org
reply.content: Unfortunately, I was out of town and could not quickly fix the problem, please try the update today.

title: UPDATE it now work as of last update.

author: Bruce Wong
comment: The new update fixed all the issues I had and is working great! By far this is the best gallery app I've found, well worth the cost. The developer is also very helpful when there are issues. Excellent app, excellent customer service! Five stars! :D Thank you!

reply.author: Jajaz.org
reply.content: Unfortunately, I was out of town and could not quickly fix the problem, please try the update today.

title: Best Android Wear Gallery app!!!

author: lee bowler
comment: Basic functions but works very well, opens the galleries in their named folders ie camera, misc etc. Pinch to zoom and save to watch would be nice additions to the app. Jun 15: developer kept their word, pinch zoom and save to watch now included! thanks

reply.author: Jajaz.org
reply.content: Good day! Soon the functionality of the program will be expanded)

comment: After new update is working on sw3
title: Thanks

author: Callum Clarke
comment: Brilliant,works great!Well worth the money.
title: Moto 360

author: Rammy Tech
comment: At firsr my lg g watch doesnt recognise the app...it took 40-45 minutes to install on the watch...but the wait really wortg it...thanks for such a great app.....edit - after 5.1.1 update installing only take a minute, keep it up dev, really nice work
title: Awesome work, thank you

author: Tenzin Choklang
comment: The gallery images have great quality way better then the myroll gallery. At first was a little skeptical because the myroll gallery quality was bad and I was expecting the same from this app but the quality was great. I was able to zoom in and even read texts in images. Only problem is it would have nicer if the app was 99 cents I think that's a mark that is most attractive to consumers. 2 dollars makes you think twice about buying a app like this. But overall good app with good quality
title: Great quality but cost too much

author: Robert Carter
comment: Does what it says it will... show your pics on your watch... in my case, a ZEN watch. zoom and rotate functions work perfectly. Many thanks. I am surprised that Google does not license this product in Android Wear as I think it is essential to the smart watch experience.
title: Really Like This Galleryt App

comment: I love the way this app functions,it is one of the better wear photo apps.I think it just would look better with some material design elements and buttons.

comment: Its very easy to use and works awsome, the price its worthed if quality doesnt go down on future updates

comment: Finally found the app I was hunting for to view photos on my watch! I love it, but can echo others with some sort of multi-touch zoom feature and also, a gallery view would be great as opposed to endless scrolling. I have over 500 photos in one of my phone photo albums and viewing with a 4 photo per screen or something to sort by date would be very useful for me. Great app though!! Keep up the good work and improvements.
